item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/patagonia/#comment-62250">James</a>.
Thanks my friend! I thought of you every day in Patagonia - can't wait to go back there with you.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to James.

Thanks my friend! I thought of you every day in Patagonia – can’t wait to go back there with you.
